Package galamsey

Class Observatory

  • java.lang.Object
    • galamsey.Observatory
  • public class Observatory
extends java.lang.Object
    Observatory class with fields, methods and constructor to store and retrieve the name of the observatory, the name of the country in which it is located, the year in which galamsey observations started, the area covered by the observatory (in square kilometers) and a list of galamsey events that it has recorded. It also returns; The largest galamsey colour value recorded by the observatory. The average galamsey colour value recorded at the observatory. A list of all galamsey recorded at the observatory with a colour value greater than a given/arbitrary number.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  Observatory.MyComparator
      A personal Comparator to return the maximum colour value between two galamsey objects.

      • Observatory

        public Observatory​(java.lang.String nameofObservatory,
                   java.lang.String countryName,
                   int yearSiteGalam,
                   double area)
        A third constructor that takes into account the fact that most observatories will be created before the list of Galamsey events they register is established.
        Parameters:
        nameofObservatory - A string that holds the name of the observatory String.
        countryName - , A string that holds the country name.
        yearSiteGalam - , An integer representing the year in which the observatory was started.
        area - An ArrayList that holds the cases of identified cases of Galamsey cases.

      • Observatory

        public Observatory​(java.lang.String nameofObservatory)
        This constructor allows for observatories to be created when only their names are known. The advantage of doing this is evident when users try to insert Galamsey events, and cite observatories that does not exist at the time.
        Parameters:
        nameofObservatory -

      • addGalamseyEvent

        public boolean addGalamseyEvent​(Galamsey obs)
        This method allows us to add a given galamsey object to an already existing observatory class by adding the galamsey object to the attribute that holds the list of galamsey objects.
        Parameters:
        obs - An object of type Galamsey.
        Returns:
        a boolean that is false if the Galamsey object was already in the list, and true if it was newly added.
